title: 50 minutes daily
info: 50 minutes of calls for 1 day at the price of 15 Afghanis. To activate 801 and to deactivate send PU801 to 3378.

title: 100 minutes daily
info: 100 minutes of calls for 1 day at the price of 25 Afghanis. Send 900 to activate and PU900 to 3378.

title: 125 minutes daily
info: 125 minutes of calls for 1 day at the price of 40 Afghanis. Send 700 to activate and PU700 to 3378 to deactivate.

title: 125 minutes daily
info: 125 minutes of calls for 1 day at the price of 40 Afghanis. Send 700 to activate and PU700 to 3378 to deactivate.
